data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Inspect route/dispatch state after bookings and verify assignment/ETA/operational telemetry consistency.
data.expectedResult: Route/dispatch records align with bookings and can be used for operations decisions.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.
